USE electric_vehicle_ldw
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('silver.location') IS NOT NULL DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.location  --si existe la tabla externa, la elimina
GO

 CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.location
     WITH (
        DATA_SOURCE = electric_vehicle_src,             --https://entixcoviddl.dfs.core.windows.net/electric-vehicle-data/
        LOCATION = 'silver/location',                   --carpeta donde se almacenar√° el resultado de la ingesta y transformacion de datos   
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format               --formato de salida de los datos (parquet)
    )
    AS
    SELECT *
        FROM bronze.location
    GO

SELECT * FROM silver.location
GO
